IVisualizationClientRaw.ClientDataPointer (PROP)
IVisualizationClientRaw.ClientDataPointer (PROP)
Â¶
PROPERTY ClientDataPointer : POINTER TO VisuElemBase.VisuStructClientData
Returns the ClientDataPointer which is needed for other functionalities for
which there is no alternative in VisuUtils. Normally this pointer should
only be passed to other functions. The internal data should not be accessed.
